title: Denominator
text: We want to include only values of the input that do not force the denominator to be zero.

title: Denominator
text: When there is an even root in the formula, we exclude any real numbers that result in a negative number in the radicand.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Set the radicand in the denominator greater than zero and solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Solve the inequation $$x-6>0$$. Express the solution in the form of interval.

title: Numerator
text: When there is an even root in the formula, we exclude any real numbers that result in a negative number in the radicand.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Set the radicand in the numerator greater than or equal to zero and solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Solve the inequation $$x-4 \geq 0$$. Express the solution in the form of interval.

title: Inteval Union
text: The answers are all real numbers where $$x \geq 4$$ and $$x>6$$.
